CodeBlockMethod.Name: IsHitTarget
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local ImmuneCooldown = self.Entity.Unit.UnitInfo["ImmuneCooldown"] local currentTime = _UtilLogic.ElapsedSeconds
if self.LastHitTime + ImmuneCooldown < currentTime then self.LastHitTime = _UtilLogic.ElapsedSeconds return true end
return false

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnHit
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local Entity = self.Entity local Defence = Entity.Unit.UnitInfo["Defence"]
if damage > 0 then if Defence < damage then __base:OnHit(attacker,damage - Defence,isCritical,attackInfo,hitCount) end else local HealEffect = "9acc7ba7139143f9a3077dc9aca435cd" _EffectService:PlayEffectAttached(HealEffect, Entity, Vector3.zero, 0, Vector3.one, false) Entity.Unit:CalcDmg(damage) end
